briefTitle: Study to Evaluate the Long-Term Safety of PA32540 in Subjects Who Are at Risk for Developing Aspirin-Associated Gastric Ulcers
officialTitle: A 12-Month, Phase 3, Open-Label, Multi-Center Study to Evaluate the Long-Term Safety of PA32540 in Subjects Who Are at Risk for Developing Aspirin-Associated Gastric Ulcers
summary: This study uses an open-label design and will be conducted in approximately 40 sites in the United States. Approximately 400 subjects will be enrolled in the study to ensure that approximately 300 subjects will have 6 months exposure to PA32540 and at least 100 subjects will have 12 months exposure to PA32540.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects Monitored for Long-term Safety of PA32540
